Systematic eye check at birth, 2 months, 4 months, between 9 and 24 months, 2-3 years, 5 years (6th<sup>year</sup>)

Very frequent anomalies: 1 in 5 children under 6 years of age

question.question: At what ages are systematic eye checks recommended for children, according to standard guidelines?
question.option_a: At birth, 3 months, 6 months, 1 year, 2 years, and 5 years
question.option_b: At birth, 2 months, 4 months, 9 months, 2 years, and 5 years
question.option_c: At birth, 2 months, 4 months, between 9 and 24 months, 2-3 years, and 5 years
question.option_d: At birth, 1 month, 3 months, 6 months, 1 year, and 4 years
